component.name: FreeMe!GB
component.summary: A GameBoy simulator written in Go. GUI bindings are written in for GTK+. This program is designed to simulate the real hardware that was equipped in the system itself.

description.p: FreeMe!GB is a GameBoy simulator that has seen multiple program language iterations. Currently, the latest iteration is in Go. Previous iterations include, C++ (Qt, then GTK) and Node.js (Electron.js)
